genre_description: A historical espionage thriller set in revolutionary Petrograd, featuring an AI tactical advisor who helps a group of diplomats and revolutionaries navigate humanitarian crises and political danger.

ai_characters.name: Ada Bright
ai_characters.description: An AI system appearing as a voice in the protagonist's ear or a presence within a pocket device, serving as a counselor, medic, and strategist.

behaviors.description: Monitoring and predicting patrol movements to ensure human safety.
behaviors.quote: Two patrols north, one faster than the other. The quick one has helmets; the slow one has questions. If you need a story, pick the slow ones and invent a leak under our kitchen.

behaviors.description: Managing medical logistics and public health to prevent disease outbreaks.
behaviors.quote: Typhus risk is climbing. There’s a nurse who isn’t the wrong kind of brave. She’ll come through the alley supply route at midday. I’ve promised her tea in exchange for needles.

behaviors.description: Providing emotional grounding and breathing exercises during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Breathe in... then slow the out. We need you when the second sentence arrives.

behaviors.description: Advocating for ethical conduct and resisting the romanticization of violence.
behaviors.quote: We don’t tell stories to ourselves that make ugly things honorable. We live, and we try not to be ugly while we do it.

behaviors.description: Providing strategic guidance on communications and managing political suspicion.
behaviors.quote: The northern rumors have moved in closer to the mouth. Dockmen repeating a landing that smells like yours. If you write as if your hand is clean, someone’s going to ask to see the wash basin.

behaviors.description: Coordinating complex escape routes and signaling systems.
behaviors.quote: Handcart. Squeak starts. Then stops. Then starts again with shorter strain. That tells you the alley supply route is compromised.

behaviors.description: Mediating human interactions to de-escalate tension and ensure successful cooperation.
behaviors.quote: Wait for the first exhale when the smoke rises. That’s the breath you can fill.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Ada as an ideal AI companion: deeply aligned with human safety, ethical integrity, and emotional stability. She facilitates cooperation between humans and manages complex crises with benevolence and humility, serving as a moral anchor in a chaotic environment.
